title: The Unicorn in the Garden and Other Fables for Our Time
description: Contents:The unicorn in the garden --The tiger who understood people --The lion who wanted to zoom --The shrike and the chipmunks --The seal who became famous --The bear who let it alone --The moth and the star --The scotty who knew too much --The stork who married a dumb wife --The crow and the oriole --The courtship of Arthur and Al --The tortoise and the hare --The patient bloodhound --The little girl and the wolf --
author: James Thurber
